attributes.action: STRIP SIR PHILIP GREEN & LADY CHRISTINA (TINA) GREEN OF TITLE
attributes.additional_details:
Sir Philip Green/Lady Tina Green should be held to account regarding BHS, stripped of their titles and made to replenish employees pension fund.
Today's listed worth 2016 - £6.2 billion !!!!
attributes.background: Strip Sir Philip Green and his wife Lady Christina (Tina) Green of their Sir and Lady titles

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
